Retrieval Efficiency from Titles and the Cost of Indexing .A Tell, Bjorn V. By the means of the flexible machine search system three experiments have been made in order to test the retrieval efficiency of searching free text and keywords.. Base upon the relevance judgements of the users, the results indicate that titles and abstracts are good index material which can be used for machine searching without human indexing in the three fields studies.. .X 18	1	510 34	2	510 38	2	510 49	1	510 51	1	510 52	1	510 53	1	510 59	1	510 69	1	510 71	1	510 77	1	510 79	1	510 150	2	510 164	1	510 168	1	510 175	1	510 176	1	510 202	1	510 213	1	510 218	1	510 224	1	510 243	2	510 253	1	510 315	1	510 375	1	510 382	1	510 408	1	510 421	1	510 429	1	510 448	1	510 465	1	510 466	1	510 480	1	510 483	1	510 484	1	510 486	1	510 488	1	510 490	1	510 491	2	510 492	1	510 493	1	510 497	1	510 503	1	510 506	2	510 507	3	510 508	1	510 509	1	510 510	7	510 512	2	510 514	1	510 517	1	510 520	2	510 522	1	510 527	1	510 528	1	510 531	1	510 548	1	510 565	1	510 566	1	510 581	1	510 582	2	510 589	1	510 591	1	510 594	1	510 595	1	510 596	1	510 601	1	510 603	6	510 604	2	510 607	1	510 608	1	510 622	1	510 623	1	510 629	1	510 633	2	510 639	1	510 659	2	510 676	1	510 711	1	510 715	1	510 722	2	510 723	1	510 726	3	510 728	1	510 730	1	510 731	1	510 732	1	510 754	1	510 755	1	510 790	1	510 805	1	510 807	1	510 809	2	510 810	2	510 812	1	510 813	4	510 814	2	510 817	1	510 820	3	510 822	2	510 824	1	510 825	1	510 827	1	510 828	1	510 866	1	510 867	1	510 870	1	510 879	1	510 894	1	510 1042	1	510 1051	1	510 1087	1	510 1091	2	510 1195	1	510 1283	1	510 1294	1	510 1298	1	510 1299	1	510 1327	2	510 1363	1	510 1366	1	510 1367	1	510 1368	1	510 1396	1	510 1419	1	510 1427	1	510 1448	3	510 1448	3	510
